transcript:
Customer: Mangal Bhavan Amangal Hari
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ji
Executive: Haan ji good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning ji.
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha sir main senior manager India Mart sir kaise hai sir aap bolo
Customer: Haan ji sir wo baat hui thi aapse sir Friday se aap keh rahe the Saturday ko wo onboarding person aapse milne aayega sir finance bataenge ki kya karna hai sir.
Customer: Wo aaya to nahi hai phone uthana band kar diya bhai.
Executive: Nahi wo aapne bola tha bas isiliye maine aapka yahan pe continue koi baat nahi bhai FIR darj karunga main kya karunga uske naam pe karunga paisa to wohi le gaya.
Customer: Achcha abhi main ho jao.
Executive: Abhi aap kya chahte hai sir bataiye aage fir isko continue kara.
Customer: Dekho mujhe mera na kaam nahi aayega to bhai mujhe kya jitna din harassment kiya hai India Mart utna din ke compensation chahiye aur plus paisa chahiye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye main ek cheez aapko main bola tha sir ki aapka product line mein sir competition jyada hai hai na sir.
Customer: Hame mere baat suno sun to lo aap paisa doge to competition koi bhi rahe lead humko dena bhai India Mart ke kaam hai.
Executive: Haan lead sir dekhiye aisa nahi hai ki lead approve nahi ho rahi hai ho rahi hai sir lekin wo na matlab wo actively sold out bhi ho ja rahi hai sir isiliye maine aapko bola tha sir ki aap chahe to past transaction matlab jo past hamara violet generate ho raha hai na to wahan se bhi sir main aapka I am interested mark karwana chah raha tha but aapne mana kar diya tha mujhe clearly.
Aapne bola ki nahi wo onboarding person aayega main unse baat karunga fir main aapko bataunga finally ki kya karna hai sir to isiliye maine aapka wait kiya sir aur sir Sunday tha to baat maine nahi kiya.
Aaj office khuli thi to early morning isiliye maine aapko lagaya ki agar aap log ka discussion ho gaya hai agar dekhiye sir India Mart ka ye nahi nahi India Mart chor hai.
Customer: Hum to bolenge chor hai.
Executive: Chor ka kya hum to India Mart ke malik bhi aayega na usko do thappar marte hai hum mere samne aa jaye hum paisa de rakhe hai agar main bhi kisi se paisa leke kaam nahi karenge to humko bhi do thappar laga dega.
Customer: To abhi aap kya chahte hai aap bataiye isko aage continue karana hai sir ya.
Executive: Main continue kuch nahi agar kaam nahi India me mere baat suno mail pe likhit chahiye mujhe.
Customer: Mail pe likhit matlab sir.
Executive: Agar kaam doge kitna saal mein lead doge usne khali bola ab mujhe mail pe chahiye mere email id wo kar lo agar lead nahi aaya ek mahina mein to bhai uska bharpai kaun karega.
Executive: Lead ko sir dekhiye wo cheez nahi hai bhai muh se nahi chalunga main na.
Muh wala kahani nahi karunga hame mail pe chahiye likhit mein chahiye.
Executive: Likhit mein sir dekhiye sir jo jitni bhi valid approve ho rahi hai na sir valid mein sir har cheez to rehna padega aapko sir wo sold out ho jati hai sir ab likhit mein aapko main kya dunga.
Customer: Aayega jabhi to abhi tum dekho mera wo kholo ye biogas ye kaun dal diya biogas ke bio reactor alag hota hai biogas alag hota hai.
Executive: Bhai lead biogas kya aayega to hum kyu kyu uthayenge ye batao.
Customer: Theek hai sir isiliye to maine aapse sir video meeting ka bhi request kiya tha aapne mujhe clearly mana kar diya tha sir Delhi mein koi banda rehta hai to tumhara banda aata hai ki nahi account manager aata hai ki nahi aaya main to pehle liya tha to aata tha.
Executive: Sir abhi dekhiye sir maine aapko last time bhi bola sir ki abhi account sir hamare head office Noida se sir handle kiya jayega jo hum aapko account manager provide karte hai jahan se aapko sari cheez aapko guide kiya jayega aur aapka account manager sir leave pe hai maine bataya tha sir ki unke family mein kuch issue hua hai sir unke grandmother expire kar gaye the isiliye wo leave pe hai sir isiliye maine aapse connect bhi kiya tha sir but aapne clearly mujhe mana kar diya nahi mujhe ye nahi karna hai mere paas wo se baat ho rahi hai to wo aayega baat ho chuka hai theek hai aur maine aapko phone utha raha mat uthane do karenge uska number hai sab kuch hai ha uske baad maine ye bhi aapko option diya tha maine uske baad aapko ye bhi option diya tha sir ki agar aapko lag raha hai ki nahi agar nahi aana hai mujhe refund chahiye to maine aapko ye bhi bataya sir ki hamara pro data basis pe jo refund hota hai jitna aapka service sir use hua hai sir utna aapka amount deduct hoga baki amount aapka sir refund hoga sir ye cheez bhi maine aapko option diya tha.
Customer: Service activity to hua hi nahi hai kuch hua hi nahi hai to kya wo katega kya ye to mujhe bata do.
Executive: India Mart ke sir jitne din services aapke chalti hai na aap apna catalog ka profile ya aap apna product line agar sir google mein bhi search karte hai na aap apna location check kijiye jaisa jo bhi aapka GST address ke according hoga sir India Mart ek visibility aapko sir promote karta hai sir aisa nahi hai sir aapka account ka promotion nahi ho raha aapka ek proper catalog bhi bana hua hai iska domain bhi hum aapko provide karte hai sir.
Customer: Mere baat sun lo wo jo catalog download hua hai na wo main khud de rakha hai.
Executive: Catalog download hua hai matlab.
Customer: Haan wo khud de rakha hai maine.
Executive: Nahi to catalog ka aapne product line aapko to dena padega sir catalog jo design hota hai sir wo to sir hamare production team karti hai na sir uske according aapke catalog ka design hota hai sir aapko hum sab domain dete hai sir jahan pe aap ek hamare verified plus supplier dikhte ho sir online maine kya domain kya de rakha hai wo apna naam mera number kya hai.
Customer: Sab domain sir sab domain sab domain sir sab domain main domain nahi keh raha main sab domain keh raha hun ha sab domain main keh raha hun jaise India Mart slash fir aapka company ka naam hoga sir ek sab domain hum provide kar rahe hai.
Executive: Bhai usme dal do mujhe refund chahiye mera jo account number hai na usme paisa dalwa do.
Customer: To theek hai agar aapko refund chahiye sir to refund ke liye theek hai main isko aage escalate kar deta hu mere jo senior honge sir wo ek bar aapko connect karke sir jo bhi pro data basis ke according hoga sir wo aapka amount refund hoga sir theek hai usme to koi issue nahi hai aapko.
Executive: Theek hai koi issue nahi hai humko.
Customer: Theek hai main wohi kar de raha hu fir sir chaliye koi issue nahi bhaiya mujhe mail chahiye jo bol rahe ho na mere baat suno.
Executive: Wo sir dekhiye main abhi update karunga na sir koi bhi concern hamare paas bhi raise hota hai na sir to hamari bhi sir priority hoti hai sir ki us concern ko hum sort out kare sir hai na sir agar acche se hum support karenge sir kisi company mein kaam karo to mail pe chahiye humko.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai koi baat nahi main abhi update kar de raha hu sir mere senior ek bar aapko connect kar lenge sir aur jo bhi hoga sir ek bar unse baat karke main usko kar lenge sir aapka theek hai theek hai kar do abhi theek
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive promised onboarding support.

- Wants compensation for harassment and money back.

- Wants lead details in writing via email.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive assured escalation for refund processing.

- Executive promised to update and have senior connect.



Next Steps: 

- Senior executive will connect for refund process.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, email, compensation
